text: wallh subhanah jaeal min jnskm azwaja; ltstryh nufusikum mehn, wajaeal lakum minhuna alabna' wmin nslhnn alahfad, warazaqakum min alatemt altayibat min althimar walhbwb wallhwm waghayr dhalik. 'afabialbatil min alwhyt shurakayihim ywmnwn, wbnem allah alty la tuhsaa yjhdwn, wala yashkurun lah b'ifradh jl wela balebad?
